text: John Donald Fiedler (February 3, 1925 â€“ June 25, 2005) was an American actor. He played Juror #2 in 12 Angry Men (1957) and was the voice of Piglet in Disney's Winnie the Pooh movies.Bernstein, Adam. "Actor John Fiedler Dies; Was Piglet's Voice in 'Pooh' Films", The Washington Post. June 28, 2005. Accessed December 15, 2007. "John Fiedler, 80, a stage, film and television actor who excelled at meek or nervous roles and was personally chosen by Walt Disney to play the voice of Piglet in Winnie the Pooh films, died June 25 at the Lillian Booth Actors' Home in Englewood, N.J." ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Actors from Wisconsin Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Cancer deaths in New Jersey
title: John Fiedler
